name: Paneer Butter Masala
description: A rich and creamy curry made with paneer (Indian cottage cheese) simmered in a tomato-based sauce, flavored with butter, cream, and a blend of aromatic spices.

name: Egg Breakfast
description: A warm flour tortilla filled with scrambled eggs, crispy bacon, cheese, and a dash of hot sauce for a hearty and satisfying breakfast.

name: Egg Muffin
description: Fluffy pancakes made with ripe bananas, perfect for a sweet and satisfying breakfast served with maple syrup or fresh fruit.

name: Grilled Chicken with Lemon Herb Sauce
description: Juicy grilled chicken breasts served with a zesty lemon herb sauce, accompanied by roasted vegetables and a side of rice.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Marinated chicken pieces cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce, flavored with aromatic spices, served with naan bread or rice.

name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
description: Creamy Alfredo sauce tossed with fettuccine pasta and topped with grilled chicken, garnished with Parmesan cheese and fresh parsley.

name: Chickpea Salad
description: A refreshing salad made with chickpeas, cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, and feta cheese, tossed in a lemon-olive oil vinaigrette.

name: Paneer Tikka Wrap
description: Marinated paneer cubes grilled to perfection and wrapped in a whole wheat tortilla with fresh vegetables, mint chutney, and a tangy yogurt dressing.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Succulent shrimp sautéed in garlic, butter, and white wine, tossed with linguine and fresh parsley for a delightful seafood pasta.

name: Chicken Naan
description: Soft naan bread filled with spiced chicken, cooked to perfection. Served hot with raita or chutney.

name: Aloo Gobi
description: A classic dry curry made with tender potatoes and cauliflower florets sautéed with turmeric, cumin, and other spices, offering a deliciously simple yet satisfying dish.

name: Veg Biryani
description: A fragrant and colorful one-pot dish made with long-grain basmati rice, mixed vegetables, and a blend of spices, often garnished with fried onions, raisins, and nuts.

name: Palak Paneer
description: A nutritious and vibrant curry featuring paneer cubes cooked in a creamy spinach gravy, enriched with a medley of spices for a delightful flavor.

name: Veg Pulao
description: A simple yet delicious rice dish made with a variety of mixed vegetables, aromatic spices, and herbs, perfect as a main course or side dish.

name: Veg Upma
description: A savory South Indian breakfast dish made with semolina, mixed vegetables, and seasoned with mustard seeds, curry leaves, and spices.

name: Veg Paratha
description: Indian whole wheat flatbread stuffed with a mixture of spiced vegetables, served with yogurt, pickles, or a side of curry.

name: Banana Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes made with ripe bananas, perfect for a sweet and satisfying breakfast served with maple syrup or fresh fruit.
